ComicInfo.Title: Meat Box (part one); The New War!; The Licker in Lost Boobie-Chain Blues; I Was Killing When Killing Wasn't Cool; Gruesome Charlie in "No Erect Penises"; The Chuckling Whatsit (part three); The Forgotten Dream of a Melancholy Chef
